RevereMA | flickr™ HiveMind Search (by popluarity)

RevereMA | flickr™ HiveMind Search (by recent uploads)

This photo is featured in this goup's discussion...

Practice | Polygonal Lasso Tool • Abobe Photoshop Elements (PSE):

www.flickr.com/groups/pse/discuss/72157624991885687/

______________________________________________

High rise apartments and Main Pavillion to Revere Beach. This was shot a couple days after the actual sand castle/sculpture competition. They leave them up for viewing for about a week or so, depending on the weather. If you look at the original size you will see the castles from the back. The sculptors do all sides. The high rises are fairly new, and I have always loved the architecture. It is a massive collection of housing units, but done with aesthetics in mind. The stepping also allows for more units to have the spectacular view that is out those windows.

It also reminds me of the way a Pueblo communities are done. I am sure the architects had that in mind when they were designing it. It is a needed structure that looks very nice in its surroundings.

______________________

qwikLoadr™ Videos...

Emerson, Lake & Palmer | Lucky Man Montreux Live! • YouTube™

This may be it for awhile. flickr messed up the sizes in over 15,000 of my images over last weekend. I have no way of fixing this mistake, and I don't know if flickr can. If they do and mess up the static links I will lose work of over 5 years. That is something I wish not to think of. They completely broke my GrfxDziner account too.

I posted in the help forum:

www.flickr.com/help/forum/en-us/72157625263928740/#reply7...

The first time they broke 12,000 links which took me 5 weeks to fix them all. Two weeks after that they broke almost 10,000 more, which took the entire month of September for me to fix. Once I fixed them, they said they rewrote code to fix them, which they did not, because there are two I left in the comments below. Still broken.

I use facebook, and you can find me there:

www.facebook.com/GrfxDziner

Thank you to all my friends here for the many years, It has been wonderful interacting with you. I hope to find a better site to share my things with others. I wish this site here worked better as all my time has been invested here. Thanks again.

NOTE II: You see the sweatshirt Katherine is wearing in the March for Justice video? My friend's sister had her boyfriend make them for Katherine....they sold them to raise money for the reward. Note: it never got larger....and in 2012 I was told the money was all gone from the bank....and the person made new account on flickr and commented in the cover shot in comment. True Story.

If you are ever in the Boston area

be sure to check out the John F. Kennedy Library and Museum...

www.jfklibrary.org/

It is such a wonderful museum, and just yesterday they have completed redoing that site to include the largest archive of its kind on the internet. There are all kinds of interesting photos and videos included. It is something John F. Kennedy had always dreamed was possible.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

qwikLoadr™ Videos...

Chili Peppers | Can't Stop Official • Vimeo™

Green Day | Time of Your Life Live! • YouTube™

This is one of the sandcastles I am working on. I wanted to add this as available to anyone that wished to work on it. I do have many more as well, and I will have them available when I get some of my edits done. This one second place at the Festival.

I know the horizon is way off, as I was going for only the sculpture. I only have the sand bleed off on the left side, but I think I will add to it on the right. It is a little underexposed too, which I like for the castle shots. I seem to get the textures better that way. I shot these with a point and shoot camera too.

Here are some others too if you want to play around with them...

www.flickriver.com/photos/tags/castleSun2
